name: Outrun the Darkness
description:
Looking around you find yourself in strange, new area. A dirt wall behind you, grass at your feet, and only a flashlight to protect you. Hoping that you can do more than delay the inevitable end as the darkness is quickly upon you. Better start running! And make sure to pick up as many batteries as you can to keep the dark at bay!

CONTROLS

Move: W, A, S, D, or the arrows
Run: Hold SHIFT
Sprint: Hold CTRL, be careful, it consumes energy
Jump: Spacebar
